actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to modify the project for flood control below Chatfield Dam on the South Platte River, Col., authorized by the Flood Control Act of 1950.

summary.text: Provides for the modification of the project for flood control below Chatfield Dam on the South Platte River, Colorado, authorized by the Flood Control Act of 1950 by authorizing the Secretary of the Army to participate with non-Federal interests in the development of recreational facilities in such project.

titles.title: A bill to modify the project for flood control below Chatfield Dam on the South Platte River, Col., authorized by the Flood Control Act of 1950.
